dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified the CM/PowerHal/DDR voting issue as the root cause, aligning with the human expert report.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The agent captured the main causal links but did not explicitly mention the CPU's role in the chain.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: The agent accurately reported most metrics but missed some CPU frequency details.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning was logical and correctly ruled out MMDVFS as a cause.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: The suggested fixes were practical and relevant to the identified issues.
